channel.title: CVE Feed for vickyagravat -- CodeMirror Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vickyagravat -- CodeMirror Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-1791|2024-02-28T08:33:07.566Z -- vickyagravat -- CodeMirror Blocks
item.description: The CodeMirror Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the Code Mirror block in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
